contents:
我来的时候，居然只有22个人点赞，回复一个支持楼主做法的都没有。

我认为，楼主对他个人身份的定义、对他与政府的关系的判断，并不影响他为所发生的的事情感到遗憾和抱歉。

因此我支持楼主做法，不仅支持我还要帮楼主翻译。

The Chinese government's lack of competence brought the world into this new coronavirus epidemic. On top of that, they're reluctant to acknowledge the help/assistance/support from other countries (US, Japan, Taiwan, HK...) because that makes them look bad.

No matter how we hate our government for what they did, or how we tried our best to spread the truth and criticize their wrongdoing, as members of this country, we believe it's our fault for such government to exist in the first place.

As a holder of the Chinese(Mainland) National ID, I would like to apologize to the world, especially to people from HK, Taiwan, the US, and Japan. 

We're sorry for causing all these troubles during this originally-peaceful Chinese new year.
